articles.title: After four years Peter Moody returns a winner with first runner! - Racenet
articles.description: After a four-year absence champion trainer Peter Moody has made a winning return to racing on a cold Sunday afternoon in front of an all-but empty track, and far from the glamour of big city racing .
articles.content:
